name: Privacy Compliance Audit
description: Ensures code maintains zero-knowledge architecture and privacy standards

action.content:
Privacy Audit Checklist:

1. ✅ No plaintext messages sent over network
2. ✅ No sensitive data in console.log statements
3. ✅ Keys generated with cryptographically secure random
4. ✅ Private keys never leave client device
5. ✅ User data encrypted at rest
6. ✅ Minimal metadata exposed to server
7. ✅ No PII collection or storage

Review the saved file for any privacy violations.
